parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post contains "CMF 11240014" at the end, suggesting it's electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly mentions and supports George Simion for President. While the parliamentary elections are not directly mentioned, the context strongly implies an endorsement related to the political party AUR, which is participating in the parliamentary elections.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post targeting a wide audience in Hunedoara County, Romania, as evidenced by the ad's reach and targeting data.  It's not a private communication; it aims to reach a large number of people. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support George Simion, implicitly promoting AUR. The language used ("moment istoric," "schimbare adevărată," "vot pentru o România mai bună") is clearly designed to influence voting behavior. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content. It presents a biased perspective, advocating for a specific candidate and party, rather than providing balanced information.  It's clearly promotional, not journalistic.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action, urging voters to support a particular candidate. The tone is not merely expressive but actively persuasive.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>555150543924818</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by AUR - Sălașu de Sus, promotes George Simion for President. While not explicitly mentioning the parliamentary elections, the strong association with AUR and the clear call to action to vote for Simion strongly suggests an attempt to influence the parliamentary elections indirectly. The post uses persuasive language, targets a wide audience in Hunedoara County, and contains a CMF number, all indicating electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is clearly to garner support for AUR, even if not directly stated for the parliamentary elections.  The timing of the post, considering the provided date, is also relevant.  The only counterargument would be that the post focuses on presidential elections, but the strong link to AUR and the clear intent to influence voters makes this a weak argument.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>George Simion</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 555150543924818) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează indirect candidatul George Simion la președinție, asociindu-l cu AUR și îndemnând la vot pentru acesta, având un efect electoral clar asupra alegerilor parlamentare. Postarea, cu un buget de 600-699 RON, a atins 100.000-125.000 de impresii și a vizat în principal județul Hunedoara, utilizând un limbaj persuasiv ("moment istoric," "schimbare adevărată") și conținând numărul CMF 11240014.  Această postare, deși nu menționează explicit alegerile parlamentare, are ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea AUR, reprezentând astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Contact: iuliangros8@gmail.com, +40728044104, https://www.facebook.com/aursalasudesus/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
